Keep up with some of the latest happenings in the financial aid industry. National FFELP guarantor American Student AssistanceÂ® has designed a full day training event to discuss some of the hottest topics affecting financial aid offices!

Student Retention - What's the Big Deal? Join us in this interactive session and discover ways to improve and / or maintain the retention rates at your school. Learn the factors found to increase the likelihood that students will persist. Begin developing strategies for your school.
Providing Absolute Customer Service Apply customer service techniques to your office. Find out how to deliver what customers want: proactive customer service. Learn to add value to student and colleague contact.
